file.name: integration.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Cat Facts
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8094
paths:
  '/session':
    post:
      summary: Cerate a new session
      requestBody:
        description: The credentials required for a new session
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateSession' }
      responses:
        'default': { $ref: '#/components/responses/HttpErrorResponse' }
        '200':
          description: A session object
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Session' }
  '/test-scopes':
    get:
      summary: Secured by jwt with scopes
      security:
        - JWTSecurity: ['test1']
      responses:
        'default': { $ref: '#/components/responses/HttpErrorResponse' }
        '200':
          description: A Test Object
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Test' }
  '/test':
    get:
      summary: Secured by jwt without scopes
      security:
        - JWTSecurity: []
      responses:
        'default': { $ref: '#/components/responses/HttpErrorResponse' }
        '200':
          description: A Test Object
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Test' }

components:
  securitySchemes:
    JWTSecurity:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer

  responses:
    HttpErrorResponse:
      description: Error Response
      content:
        application/json:
          schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/HttpError' }

  schemas:
    HttpError:
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

    # Sessions
    # =======================================

    Session:
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        jwt:
          type: string
        expiresAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        notBefore:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        user:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
      required:
        - jwt
        - user
    User:
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        picture:
          type: string
        scopes:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      required:
        - email

    CreateSession:
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
        scopes:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        other:
          type: string
      required:
        - email

    Test:
      properties:
        text:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        scopes:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      required:
        - text

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/test-scopes": get: security: at 1:2103: list of scopes MUST be empty for "type" "http"
